t: Watch The Yearling (1946) | Prime Video
s: Lonely 11-year-old Jody bonds with an orphaned yearling fawn he finds in the woods outside this family's farm. But as much as he loves the young deer, Jody must accept the difficult choice his family makes between their own survival and that of the fawn.

t: The Yearling - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Rawlings's editor was Maxwell Perkins, who also worked with F. Scott Fitzgerald, Ernest Hemingway, and other literary luminaries. She had submitted several projects to Perkins for his review, and he rejected them all. He advised her to write about what she knew from her own life, and The Yearling ...
